schema.title: CoordinateReferenceSystem
schema.description: Used to describe any kind of coordinate reference system. The type is identified by CoordinateReferenceSystemType (used by the system) and Kind facing the end-user. The Code is according to OSDU standard a string, the EPSG standard number is available via the CodeAsNumber property. Description carries EPSG's Remark. AttributionAuthority carries EPSG's DataSource. AliasNames carry the EPSG Alias contents.

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

CodeSpace.title: CRS CodeSpace
CodeSpace.description: The namespace or authority name governing this CRS definition, e.g. EPSG for contents from the EPSG Geodetic Parameter Dataset.

InformationSource.title: CRS InformationSource
InformationSource.description: The InformationSource providing the CRS definition if different from AttributionAuthority.

RevisionDate.title: CRS Revision Date
RevisionDate.description: The revision date of this CRS.

Kind.title: CRS Kind
Kind.description: The kind of CRS, e.g. bound, compound, derived, engineering, geocentric, geographic 2D, geographic 3D, projected, vertical.

CodeAsNumber.title: Code (int32)
CodeAsNumber.description: The code as number as opposed to the Code defined as a string.

CoordinateReferenceSystemType.title: CRS Type
CoordinateReferenceSystemType.description: The type of coordinate reference system. This is an enumeration of concrete sub-types.

HorizontalCRS.title: Horizontal CRS
HorizontalCRS.description: The horizontal CRS reference of a CompoundCRS. Only populated for CoordinateReferenceSystemType==CompoundCRS.

AuthorityCode.title: Horizontal CRS Authority Code
AuthorityCode.description: The HorizontalCRS authority code, corresponding to the ISO19111 ID and 'projjson' id.

VerticalCRS.title: Vertical CRS
VerticalCRS.description: The vertical CRS reference of a CompoundCRS. Only populated for CoordinateReferenceSystemType==CompoundCRS.

AuthorityCode.title: Vertical CRS Authority Code
AuthorityCode.description: The VerticalCRS authority code, corresponding to the ISO19111 ID and 'projjson' id.

Transformation.title: Bound Transformation
Transformation.description: The Transformation bound to the BaseCRS in a BoundCRS. Only populated for CoordinateReferenceSystemType==BoundCRS.

AuthorityCode.title: Transformation Authority Code
AuthorityCode.description: The Transformation authority code, corresponding to the ISO19111 ID and 'projjson' id.

TransformationID.title: BoundCRS Transformation Reference
TransformationID.description: The relationship to the bound transformation.

Datum.title: Datum
Datum.description: The datum of this CRS. Only populated for CoordinateReferenceSystemType in [GeographicCRS, VerticalCRS, EngineeringCRS].

AuthorityCode.title: Datum Authority Code
AuthorityCode.description: The Datum authority code, corresponding to the ISO19111 ID and 'projjson' id.

DatumEnsemble.title: DatumEnsemble
DatumEnsemble.description: The DatumEnsemble for the CRS's datum. Only populated for GeographicCRS.

AuthorityCode.title: DatumEnsemble Authority Code
AuthorityCode.description: The DatumEnsemble authority code, corresponding to the ISO19111 ID and 'projjson' id.

Projection.title: Projection
Projection.description: The projection operation of a ProjectedCRS. Only populated for CoordinateReferenceSystemType==ProjectedCRS.

AuthorityCode.title: Projection Operation Authority Code
AuthorityCode.description: The Projection Operation authority code, corresponding to the ISO19111 ID and 'projjson' id.

Authority.title: Projection Operation Authority
Authority.description: The projection operation  authority governing the 'Code'.

Code.title: Projection Operation Code
Code.description: The projection operation code assigned by the 'Authority'.

BaseCRS.title: Base CRS
BaseCRS.description: The base geographic CRS of this projected CRS. Only populated for CoordinateReferenceSystemType==ProjectedCRS.

AuthorityCode.title: Base CRS Authority Code
AuthorityCode.description: The BaseCRS authority code, corresponding to the ISO19111 ID and 'projjson' id.

Name.title: Base CRS Name.
Name.description: The name of the base CRS.

SourceCRS.title: Source CRS
SourceCRS.description: The source CRS of a BoundCRS. Only populated for CoordinateReferenceSystemType==BoundCRS.

AuthorityCode.title: Source CRS Authority Code
AuthorityCode.description: The SourceCRS authority code, corresponding to the ISO19111 ID and 'projjson' id.

Name.title: Source CRS Name.
Name.description: The name of the Source CRS.

SourceCRSID.title: Source CRS Reference
SourceCRSID.description: The relationship to the source CoordinateRefSystem.

TargetCRS.title: Target CRS
TargetCRS.description: The target CRS of this bound CRS. Only populated for CoordinateReferenceSystemType==BoundCRS.

AuthorityCode.title: Target CRS Authority Code
AuthorityCode.description: The TargetCRS authority code, corresponding to the ISO19111 ID and 'projjson' id.

Name.title: Target CRS Name.
Name.description: The name of the base CRS.

Usages.title: Usages
Usages.description: Contextual information about scope and extent/area of use.

items.title: Usage
items.description: Scope and extent information about the described CRS.

AuthorityCode.title: Usage Authority Code
AuthorityCode.description: The Usage authority code, corresponding to the ISO19111 ID and 'projjson' id.

Name.title: Usage Name.
Name.example: Europe - 0°E to 6°E and ED50 by country

Extent.title: Extent
Extent.description: Extent or area of use information.

AuthorityCode.title: Extent Authority Code
AuthorityCode.description: The Extent authority code, corresponding to the ISO19111 ID and 'projjson' id.

Name.title: Extent Name.
Name.example: Europe - 0°E to 6°E and ED50 by country

Description.title: Extent Description.
Description.example: Europe - between 0°E and 6°E - Andorra; Denmark (North Sea); Germany offshore; Netherlands offshore; Norway including Svalbard - onshore and offshore; Spain - onshore (mainland and Balearic Islands); United Kingdom (UKCS) offshore.

BoundingBoxSouthBoundLatitude.title: South Latitude
BoundingBoxSouthBoundLatitude.description: Southern latitude limit of the bounding box in degrees based on WGS 84

BoundingBoxWestBoundLongitude.title: West Longitude
BoundingBoxWestBoundLongitude.description: Western longitude limit of the bounding box in degrees based on WGS 84

BoundingBoxEastBoundLongitude.title: East Longitude
BoundingBoxEastBoundLongitude.description: Eastern longitude limit of the bounding box in degrees based on WGS 84

BoundingBoxNorthBoundLatitude.title: North Latitude
BoundingBoxNorthBoundLatitude.description: Northern latitude limit of the bounding box in degrees based on WGS 84

AuthorityCode.title: Scope Authority Code
AuthorityCode.description: The Scope authority code, corresponding to the ISO19111 ID and 'projjson' id.

CoordinateSystem.title: Coordinate System
CoordinateSystem.description: The coordinate system defining the dimension and individual axes used by the CRS.

AuthorityCode.title: CoordinateSystem Authority Code
AuthorityCode.description: The CoordinateSystem authority code, corresponding to the ISO19111 ID and 'projjson' id.

Name.title: Coordinate System Name.
Name.description: The name of the Coordinate System.
Name.example: Cartesian 2D CS. Axes: easting, northing (E,N). Orientations: east, north. UoM: m.

HorizontalAxisUnitID.title: Horizontal Axis Unit
HorizontalAxisUnitID.description: The horizontal unit for 2-dimensional or 3-dimensional coordinate systems. This property is not populated for 1-dimensional coordinate systems (Vertical CRSs).

VerticalAxisUnitID.title: Vertical Axis Unit
VerticalAxisUnitID.description: The vertical unit for 1-dimensional or 3-dimensional coordinate systems.

PreferredUsage.title: Preferred Usage
PreferredUsage.description: Scope and extent information about the described CRS.

AuthorityCode.title: Preferred Usage Authority Code
AuthorityCode.description: The PreferredUsage authority code, corresponding to the ISO19111 ID and 'projjson' id.

Name.title: Preferred Usage Name.
Name.example: Europe - 0°E to 6°E and ED50 by country

Extent.title: Preferred Extent
Extent.description: Extent or area of use information.

AuthorityCode.title: Preferred Extent Authority Code
AuthorityCode.description: The Preferred Extent authority code, corresponding to the ISO19111 ID and 'projjson' id.

Name.title: Preferred Extent Name.
Name.example: Europe - 0°E to 6°E and ED50 by country

Description.title: Extent Description.
Description.example: Europe - between 0°E and 6°E - Andorra; Denmark (North Sea); Germany offshore; Netherlands offshore; Norway including Svalbard - onshore and offshore; Spain - onshore (mainland and Balearic Islands); United Kingdom (UKCS) offshore.

BoundingBoxSouthBoundLatitude.title: Preferred South Latitude
BoundingBoxSouthBoundLatitude.description: Southern latitude limit of the bounding box in degrees based on WGS 84

BoundingBoxWestBoundLongitude.title: Preferred West Longitude
BoundingBoxWestBoundLongitude.description: Western longitude limit of the bounding box in degrees based on WGS 84

BoundingBoxEastBoundLongitude.title: Preferred East Longitude
BoundingBoxEastBoundLongitude.description: Eastern longitude limit of the bounding box in degrees based on WGS 84

BoundingBoxNorthBoundLatitude.title: Preferred North Latitude
BoundingBoxNorthBoundLatitude.description: Northern latitude limit of the bounding box in degrees based on WGS 84

AuthorityCode.title: Preferred Scope Authority Code
AuthorityCode.description: The Preferred Scope authority code, corresponding to the ISO19111 ID and 'projjson' id.

PersistableReference.title: Persistable Reference
PersistableReference.description: Used for export and actionable instructions to a conversion/transformation engine. It is initially based on Esri well-known text (WKT). Eventually, when Esri WKT are convertible into ISO WKT and vice versa, the definition can be replaced by https://proj.org/schemas/v0.2/projjson.schema.json.

Wgs84Coordinates.title: WGS 84 Coordinates
Wgs84Coordinates.description: The 2-dimensional bounding box derived from the extent (Polygon or MultiPolygon) based on WGS 84 (EPSG:4326). The schema of this substructure is identical to the GeoJSON FeatureCollection https://geojson.org/schema/FeatureCollection.json. The coordinate sequence follows GeoJSON standard, i.e. longitude, latitude. CoordinateReferenceSystems with an extent crossing the anti-meridian are represented by a MultiPolygon.

OGCWellKnownText2.title: OGCWellKnownText2
OGCWellKnownText2.description: OGC WKT 2 (Well-Known Text 2) OGC Well Known Text (WKT) 2  representation of a Coordinate Reference System (CRS) or coordinate operation, intended for interoperability with geospatial libraries and external systems that consume OGC-compliant WKT2 definitions
OGCWellKnownText2.example: COORDINATEOPERATION["ED50 to WGS 84 (23)",VERSION["EPSG-Nor N62 2001"],SOURCECRS[GEOGCRS["ED50",DATUM["European Datum 1950",ELLIPSOID["International 1924",6378388,297,LENGTHUNIT["metre",1,ID["EPSG",9001]],ID["EPSG",7022]],ID["EPSG",6230]],CS[ellipsoidal,2,ID["EPSG",6422]],AXIS["Geodetic latitude (Lat)",north],AXIS["Geodetic longitude (Lon)",east],ANGLEUNIT["degree",0.0174532925199433,ID["EPSG",9102]],ID["EPSG",4230]]],TARGETCRS[GEOGCRS["WGS 84",ENSEMBLE["World Geodetic System 1984 ensemble",MEMBER["World Geodetic System 1984 (Transit)",ID["EPSG",1166]],MEMBER["World Geodetic System 1984 (G730)",ID["EPSG",1152]],MEMBER["World Geodetic System 1984 (G873)",ID["EPSG",1153]],MEMBER["World Geodetic System 1984 (G1150)",ID["EPSG",1154]],MEMBER["World Geodetic System 1984 (G1674)",ID["EPSG",1155]],MEMBER["World Geodetic System 1984 (G1762)",ID["EPSG",1156]],MEMBER["World Geodetic System 1984 (G2139)",ID["EPSG",1309]],MEMBER["World Geodetic System 1984 (G2296)",ID["EPSG",1383]],ELLIPSOID["WGS 84",6378137,298.257223563,LENGTHUNIT["metre",1,ID["EPSG",9001]],ID["EPSG",7030]],ENSEMBLEACCURACY[2],ID["EPSG",6326]],CS[ellipsoidal,2,ID["EPSG",6422]],AXIS["Geodetic latitude (Lat)",north],AXIS["Geodetic longitude (Lon)",east],ANGLEUNIT["degree",0.0174532925199433,ID["EPSG",9102]],ID["EPSG",4326]]],METHOD["Position Vector transformation (geog2D domain)",ID["EPSG",9606]],PARAMETER["X-axis translation",-116.641,LENGTHUNIT["metre",1,ID["EPSG",9001]],ID["EPSG",8605]],PARAMETER["Y-axis translation",-56.931,LENGTHUNIT["metre",1,ID["EPSG",9001]],ID["EPSG",8606]],PARAMETER["Z-axis translation",-110.559,LENGTHUNIT["metre",1,ID["EPSG",9001]],ID["EPSG",8607]],PARAMETER["X-axis
